Reviews.Title: cctv guy
Reviews.Author: Christopher W Hall
Reviews.Content: the item worked as advertised.  we couldn't run a new cable so I decided to try this piece.  2 reasons i won't give it 5 stars is because the part has not been installed that long (01/15/2014) and it requires 12VDC at both ends.

ProductInfo.Features:
Two video signals over one coaxial cable with both sides BNC ports.
Up to 600 feet transmission distance; All real-time image transmission.
Built-in amplifier for zero quality loss; Compatible with RG59 and RG6 coaxial cable.
12V DC, 500mA power consumption. Easy Plug and Play.
2 free 12VDC 500mA power transformers are included.
ProductInfo.Name: NeatTek NTVM-212 Two CCTV Security Cameras Share One Coaxial Cable Trasnmitter and Receiver with BNC Ports
